Package mobileRobot

A car, inside a circuit, try to keep inside it, and to drive as fast as possible.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Polyline Definition of a closed line : we just need to know whether a car is inside or outside of the region.
 

Class Summary
Bumper An elementary Polyline : a circle not centered at the origine
CenteredCircle An elementary Polyline : an origin-centered circle
Circuit A circuit is a portion of plane between two closed curves : the agent (a racing car, or a mobile robot ...) has to drive as long as possible without hiting the walls, while running as far as possible.
CircularCircuit This circuit is a portion of plane between two origin-centered circles : the agent (a racing car ...) has to keep in lane.
MobileAction A car action consists of two possibilities : Changing speed Changing direction Hence an action consists of a new speed and a new angle, relatively to the X-axis.
MobileState A racing car is defined with : Its position on the circuit, aas its x,y coordinates.
Pinball A pinball is a circular arena into one can put several bumpers
SetOfObstacles A set of internal obstacles (imagine bumpers into a pinball !).
VisualizeArena  
 

Package mobileRobot Description

A car, inside a circuit, try to keep inside it, and to drive as fast as possible. It can have a sight of its environment through a linear retina : each pixel of this retina indicates whether a wall is near, not so far, or very far. One can modify the size of this retina, the angle of vision, the maximum speed of the car.
